entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
